tag: {display:{Name:'{"translate":"ms.skill.103","fallback":"唤灵留迹","italic":false,"color":"red"}',Lore:['[{"text":"⏲ 60s  ▶ 20s","italic":false,"color":"#7367F0"}]','{"translate":"ms.skill.103.desc.a","fallback":"移速 +20%；标记最近的灵魂后传送","italic":false,"color":"white"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.103.desc.b","fallback":"到其附近并令其高亮 5 秒，被标记的","italic":false,"color":"white"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.103.desc.c","fallback":"灵魂将显示尾迹并在空中显示痕迹","italic":false,"color":"white"}']},HideFlags:63,CustomModelData:71103}
